text:
4.7/5 stars from 272 US ratings.
Are you tired of the constant need for Wi-Fi to play even the simplest games?
Ziffy: No Wifi Games is your ultimate app for fun offline games without an internet connection.
Whether you are in airplane mode, in a low network zone, or just looking to take a break from the online world, Ziffy has your back. With more than 100 unique and addictive game collections, there is something for every situation. Keep yourself busy and entertained anytime, anywhere.
Want something to train your brain? How about a match of chess?
Want something just to pass the time? Try the Block Blast.
Want something to compete with yourself? Try your hands at archery or golf.
Key Features:
- Play Randomly: Enjoy without any interruptions. Just tap one button and surprise yourself with a random game to play. Tap again to move on to the next match as you like.
- 100+ Free Games: With the wide variety of game collections, there is always something new and exciting to play. Kill your boredom with a nonstop game marathon.
- Save Your Favourites: Add your liked games to your favoriteâ€™s folder and access them easily the next time you return for a match.
- Diverse Game Selection: Whether you are in the mood for a puzzle or action game. Ziffy has a range from strategy-building games to sports games. Play all the popular games in one app.
- Regular Updates: We keep adding new games to our collection so you can access new games to pass your time without needing the internet.
Access your recently played games on your home screen with all the fun games from the Ziffy Collection. Choose your game or play randomly with the random button.
Unlock unlimited fun while saving your data and time wasted on those irritating ads. Download the Ziffy: No Wifi Games to enjoy the classics and the modern touch of the games without interruption. Have access to endless entertainment for your boredom at your fingertips!
